title: Notice: Nautilus Reef and YOU!
body:
TL;DR

* The most recent ocean week was not for the nautilus reef.
* Nautilus reef was for the 2015 ocean week. You needed at least 3 points to have your name on the reef.
* The points earned in the 2016 ocean week will be going towards the community wall, you needed at least 10 points for your name to be featured on this wall. (More details in the near future)

Many people seem to be confused regarding their name not being on the reef, I've made this thread to hopefully clear up the confusion.

The Nautilus Reef was for the [2015 ocean week](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek-reef/index.html#faq), you had to earn at least 3 points during this event for your name to appear on the reef.
This was not the most recent Ocean Week and many of the players questioning why their name is not on the reef do not understand that.

The points earned in the [most recent ocean week](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/) will be going towards the community wall, you needed to obtain at least 10 points during this event for your name to be featured on the wall.

More details about the 2016 ocean week wall will be coming to you in the near future.

replies.body:
I think a lot of people seem to forget the 2015 event and that it was complete after only a few days! Many didn't make the cut simply because it was achieved so quickly they didn't have a chance.  I remember hearing a lot of complaints at the time that people didn't get in because once the award had been achieved they stopped counting the points.  

Still this year was a more evenly run event, the 2015 was their first effort and they didn't expect the response. If i remember correctly Riot posted a lot of surprise at the fact we got the points so quickly as it was not anywhere near the average games at the time.

Anyway, Well done guys, I'll have to visit the reef before sea life covers most of the plates.

~Tribalmind

I was on OCE server at the time, did I earn the points in time?
I was super sad to discover I was not on the statue, I don't normally play normal matchmade games but I remember working hard during the event to play the needed games!
I know I have no 2016 points (was moving at the time QQ).
My name isn't on the Nautilus Statue? I had 40+ points not to mention a nice name..{{item:3070}}

Same as me, I've been playing since season one and have contributed greatly to every event that has come up and the 3 points were nothing to me yet my name does not appear. But I suppose it's way to late now and the names would of been out for a while.

Hey Infinitykid,

Had a look and you did not earn any points in Ocean Week 2015 (last year).

You did earn 20 points during Ocean Week 2016, which was this year. So your name will be on the Ocean Week Community Wall. That's currently in progress and we will have updates for it in the future.
Thank you for that, I am quite surprised I did not earn any points but the system is probably more accurate than my memory so i will take it.

Hi SkarySkarner,

Your name isn't on the reef because you did not earn any points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year).

This year, for Ocean Week 2016, you did earn 64 points so your name will be on the Ocean Week Community Wall. That's currently in progress and we will have updates on it in the future.

I am also certain I earned more than 3 points last year, I had the icon and everything but I don't see my name on the list. I remember almost all of my name changes and still none of them have been on there, can you check it for me please? I feel like I'm missing out.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LuyUu4E2,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-04-11T09:06:06.411+0000)
>
> Hi SkarySkarner,
> 
> Your name isn't on the reef because you did not earn any points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year).
> 
> This year, for Ocean Week 2016, you did earn 64 points so your name will be on the Ocean Week Community Wall. That's currently in progress and we will have updates on it in the future.

Oh! Cheers for helping me understand :D

I thought the same until I realised the most recent ocean week  (the one where we had to defend each city) was for the community wall, the one before that was to get your name on the reef. Maybe you made the same mistake I did?

I had like 20 points in the 2015 Ocean Week, and my name isn't on there. Either of them, my current and my old one.
Come on Riot, that's really off.

20 points is really unlikely. That would mean you won 20 games in which there was an eligible champion over just a couple days. I think it more likely those points are for this years ocean week, in which case your name will be on the community wall,

Nope, I know exactly what I mean. I'm absolutely sure it was double digits, pretty sure it was 20 or so, 100% sure it was over 3, and it was for the 2015 week. The 2016 week I got only 15 or so.

I changed my name about the same week the 2015 week ended, so my guess is I was lost in the system. Still not happy about it though.

My name is not on the list it's xXThomasXx or as far as it's tommymoocow. if not mistaken i did earn more then 10 points and it should be in the system or on the statue list if not the i think i'd be on the community list or something. is there any that can done? thanks.
10 points was for this years event and your name will be on the community wall (still in progress) for that one. The Nautilus Reef was the 2015 event  which only lasted a couple days

Hi,

I can't find my name either and I am sure I participated in ocean week 2015.
Can I ask for a photo of my summoner name on the actual plaque?

Hey there,

I have my doubts that Riot will be able to provide this, however you might have better luck making your own thread in misc about it.

Maybe a friendly member of the community might be able to do this for you :)
Then will Riot host a tour to this Nautilus Reef? like organize transport and food for picnic and we can meet the league community and find our names on the plaque.. A day tour should be enough.
It's underwater, so I doubt it.
I forgot my name change...I did it the changes on the 21/2 twice and i forgot what name i used because you changed the coding and I couldn't get my name when I moved to OCE from NA
hi im confused i was in a oce week event im not sure if it is the one u guys have just posted but i got well over 70-80 pts in it can you please tell me if it wsa this 2015 or 2016??

Hey! I could not find my name on the list and I played through ocean week (got the rewards such as icon and the skin) and pretty sure my account name was still Moxiee. Not sure if I missed something or not.
The Nautilus Reef can't be put in the gold coast because he's bronze  {{champion:111}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Hi sephiroth, I was wondering why my name wasn't on the statue? The event was really well done regardless, kudos to the Oceania team involved.
I am fairly certain my name should be on the statue however I did join halfway through the event. Can you please check points for the only two names I have had Rawr Im Kemie and Cloverkawn. TIA.
My name isn't on the Nautilus Statue? I had about 12 points and there are names similar to mine that are on there.
Is there a way to find out how many points we got in 2015/2016 so that we dont have to keep asking riot individually? Also I am wondering how many points I got in 2015. :)

Hey there,

There's not currently and will not be a public facing tool to check how many points you obtained during the ocean week 2015, doing so could potentially cause issues due to the sheer amount of people who would be querying the tool for their points.

It is however, safe to assume that if your name doesn't show up on the list for the wall that you didn't obtain enough points to qualify.
In that case, are Riot staff willing to go through threads like these to answer concerns about people who thought that they did do enough to qualify but are not on the list?

Unfortunately there is not a way for you to check them Brockyss :(

You earned 1 point during 2015, which is not enough for the reef, but you earned 39 in Ocean Week 2016 so you will be on the Ocean Week community wall which is in progress =)
Thanks for the reply.

Hi,

Pretty sure I got enough points in 2015, but can't find my name. Can you check it out please?

Thanks.

m0nk3d

I don't see mine :(

My current name is Joey Wheeler but I think either Dismal David,Ninjaboi2112 or Mike Oxhard should be on there. Or would the last one have been too crass to be put on?
I'm fairly certain I made sure I earned the 3 points last year, can't find my current summoner name on the list, not sure which one I was using at that time last year. How can I check?

If you don't mind I'm going to ask about my 2015 points as well. My memory is pretty foggy but I've always participated in community evens so far so it seems a bit weird to me that I missed that one.

Cheers~
my name isnt on it
Quite sure I participated in the first Ocean week, though my summoner's name back then was Øxl. Perhaps I misremembered, though I have the Fizz icon.
I'm positive that my name should be there, so i'm really confused as to why it's not. Can i get some insight?
